info.title: BlockchainManagementClient
info.description: REST API for Azure Blockchain Service

parameters.name: blockchainMember
parameters.description: ARM BlockchainMember payload to be updated

get.description: List blockchain members of a resource group in a subscription
List blockchain members of a subscription
List consortium members for a blockchain member

parameters.name: monitor
parameters.description: Flag which if true returns OperationResultEntity and if false returns the status of te request

post.description: Get HLF connection profile which includes the client connection options including the TLS CA root certificate information.
List HLF Membership service provider certificate information
Check whether a resource name is available
List available consortiums for a subscription

get.description: List Microsoft.Blockchain Resource Provider available operations

BlockchainMember.description: ARM Resource BlockchainMember payload which exposed as Resource Provider request/response.

properties.description: Gets or sets blockchain member properties

type.description: Gets blockchain member ARM resource type

id.description: Gets blockchain member ARM resource id

sku.description: Gets or sets blockchain member sku

name.description: Gets or sets blockchain member name

TrackedResourceModel.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked top level resource.

location.description: Gets or sets blockchain member location. e.g. West US | East US | North Central US | South Central US.

tags.description: Gets or sets tags of the service which is a list of key value pairs that describe the resource.

ARMResourceModel.description: The core properties of ARM resources.

name.description: Gets or sets blockchain member name

type.description: Gets blockchain member ARM resource type

id.description: Gets fully qualified resource Id for the resource.

provisioningState.description: Gets or sets blockchain member provision state

dns.description: Gets or sets blockchain member dns endpoint

Sku.description: Blockchain member SKU in ARM payload

BlockchainMemberCollection.description: Collection of ARM Resource BlockchainMember payload which exposed as Resource Provider request/response.

value.description: Gets or sets collection of blockchain members

nextLink.description:
Gets or sets the URL the client should use to fetch the next page (per server side paging).
It's null for now, added for future use.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription Id which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupParameter.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
